bio:
Heratar is one of the Hunters of Hircine. Hircine is the Daedric Lord of the Hunt. Heratar and several other Hunters of Hircine have been sent to Bloated Man's Grotto, which is located in the mountains at the northern edge of Falkreath Hold.
Heratar is a Nord man. He wears a full set of steel armor. In combat, he wields a war axe and a shield.
The Hunters of Hircine are composed of men and women of many different races and backgrounds. Heratar and several other Hunters of Hircine have been sent by Lord Hircine to kill the werewolf Sinding, in order to send Sinding's soul to the Hunting Grounds. The Hunting Grounds is the afterlife destination associated with Hircine, and is where all werewolves and followers of Hircine are sent after their death. If the player expresses the intention to attack and kill Sinding, Heratar will help the player and will act friendly after Sinding is killed. If the player indicates that they intend to help Sinding escape the hunters, Heratar will become offended and hostile.
name: Heratar
